name: MY & MI s.r.o.
membership:
Slovak association of trade and tourism (http://www.biznis.sk/)
Asociácia distribútorov tabakových výrobkov Slovenska (ADTVS)
memberOrga: None. We are small family owned company, shareholders and authorized signatories are from one family - son and father.
goal: Distribution of premium tobacco products in Slovakia and Europe with focus on cigars, cigarillos and pipe tobacco. Company acts as European logistic hub for several cigar manufacturers, operating bonded warehouse and shipping cigars to various countries.
euInitiatives:
- EU Tobacco Product Directive
- Public consultation on the implementation
of an EU system for traceability and
security features pursuant to Articles 15
and 16 of the Tobacco Products Directive
2014/40/EU
